copy:
This page and form is not monitored 24-hours a day.  If it is an emergency, **CALL 911**. We review and respond to online correspondence during our administrative office hours (8a-4p M-F).

Please do not submit medical inquiries online. Submit all emergency medical inquiries through the Emergency Dispatch Center by calling 911 or the Non-Emergency Line at ###-###-####.

If you wish to file a complaint, please [download our Guide to the Citizen or Department Member Complaint Process]().
